title: Lowvana Life Highyaga Lyrics Vadacurry Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Lowvana Life Highyaga
Singer(s): Anirudh, Andrea Jeremiah
Movie: Vadacurry
Music: Vivek Shiva and Mervin Solomo
Lyrics: Harish

Lowvana Life Highyaga
no enbadhellaam yessaaga aanadhe.
Slow aana time-u speedaaga maaripoche
blank-aana space-u fullaaga aanadhe.

Po paaren nee pala pengal pinnaadi
naan sugavaasi un munnaadi.

Vaa nee en raani
coolugu beeraa nee
aadi paaren de en munnadi.

its sunny on my lips
its sunny on my hips
its sunny on my lips its sunny,
its sunny in the day
its sunny in the night
its sunny all the ways
say sunny

its sunny on my lips
its sunny on my hips
its sunny on my lips
its sunny, its sunny in the day
its sunny in the night
its sunny all the ways
say shit that booty maama

Ye gold-um illa silver-illa
naanum inga enna panna.
Diamond vacha platinatha
senji vachen di

Ye danceum illa stepum illa
naanum inga enna panna.
Sokka vaikkum tips konjam
solli thaayen de.

Ada koothu nee aadi vittu vaada
vanavil oru kottaikkul adaithu vittu poda
ada fittaana paiyyan neethaan vaada
adhukull ippa hittaana songu edhu podaa

Ayyayyo ammaadi, thangamthaan un meni
ottaama orsaaama unna naanum katti kolla vaa.

its sunny on my lips
its sunny on my hips
its sunny on my lips its sunny,
its sunny in the day
its sunny in the night
its sunny all the ways
say sunny

Hey hottumilla beatumilla
naanum inga enna panna.
.. thottu paarthu ok sollenda
.. place-umilla
naanum inga enna panna
saaputuputtu thanga oru kudisai thaayen danceum

Yaelu kadalu thaandi vaa nee
Ellaikku naanthaanadi saamy
Oru nightula setttaachu
life fullaa kickaachu once more
sollitu enna neeyum thooki poyenda.

sunny baby weightu
sunny kutti whiteu
sunny chellam vandhaale
nightu aaagum brightuÂ
